extension.summary: Advanced list and folder management for Kodi with disaster recovery
extension.description: Movie List Manager provides comprehensive list and folder management for Kodi with disaster recovery, intelligent media matching, and enhanced search capabilities. Features include hierarchical folder organization, portable NDJSON export/import, rich artwork integration, fast offline search with year filtering, and optional privacy-first remote services. Supports mixed content types including movies, TV episodes, music videos, and external plugin items.
extension.disclaimer: This addon requires no external accounts to function properly. All features work offline by default. Remote services are optional, privacy-first, and require explicit user opt-in configuration. The addon creates a local SQLite database for efficient list management and search functionality.
